item.title: Thought: Gillets Jaunes sounds like russian
item.description: Glad to read this, after a few weeks of wondering how the Gillets Jaunes movement in France could organize through Facebook Groups yet no-one was drawing the parallels to the last time social unfairness was harnessed by a foreign power to turn out mass-protests. Apparently there’s no smoke to that fire.
